name: Hold The Rope
description:
I would recommend to play the game in fullscreen mode.
A simple local-multiplayer where you can pull the rope against your opponent.

Controls:
Player Left:
q w e r t
a s d f g
z x c v

Player Right:
y u i o p
h j k l
b n m

Every thing is done from scratch.

This is my second finished Unity game and I would really like to get some feedback to improve my games in the future.

Have Fun :*)

game created by Moritz
for the DevAtlas Jam - March
